SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing @AetherNetSports relative to @IronwoodInvincibles?

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total social media followers?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {@AetherNetSports}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total social media followers?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {@LuminaraPlay}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is @StarburstTV's maximum Social Media Followers in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: @StarburstTV's maximum Social Media Followers is in {1974}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is @StarburstTV's minimum Social Media Followers in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: @StarburstTV's minimum Social Media Followers is in {1987}.

NC.Q: Was the total Social Media Followers in 1988 higher or lower than in 1998?
NC.A: The total social media followers in 1988 was {lower} than in 1998.

NC.Q: Between 1979 and 1995, was the average total Social Media Followers higher or lower than between 1980 and 1997?
NC.A: The average total social media followers between 1979 and 1995 was {lower} than between 1980 and 1997.

NC.Q: Between 1997 and 1998, was the average total Social Media Followers higher or lower than between 1992 and 2000?
NC.A: The average total social media followers between 1997 and 1998 was {higher} than between 1992 and 2000.

NC.Q: Between 1974 and 1995, did the total Social Media Followers experience a larger or smaller change than between 1990 and 1994?
NC.A: The change in total social media followers between 1974 and 1995 was {larger} than between 1990 and 1994.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {@NovaGamesLive} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did @NovaGamesLive and @StarburstTV first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: @NovaGamesLive and @StarburstTV first exchanged leading positions in {1975}.
